metadata.description: Agent Arena 3D Roguelike Transformation - 41 Tasks across 7 Phases

agent-arena.name: Agent Arena
agent-arena.description: High-fidelity 3D Roguelike with deep loot, progression, and real-time combat (Hades-inspired)

tasks.title: Zustand Store Architecture
tasks.description: Create main game state store (Zustand) with agent, dungeon, inventory states. Real-time sync with backend.

tasks.title: Socket.io Real-time Sync
tasks.description: Refactor backend for optimized event emission. Server snapshots, client interpolation, conflict resolution.

tasks.title: Player Input Handler
tasks.description: Keyboard (WASD), mouse targeting, ability keybinding, input buffering for fast actions.

tasks.title: Network Optimization
tasks.description: State delta compression, event batching, client prediction, latency compensation.

tasks.title: Three.js Scene Setup
tasks.description: Initialize WebGL renderer, camera/lighting, orthographic isometric view, viewport scaling.

tasks.title: Dungeon Environment Generation
tasks.description: Procedurally generated room geometry, tile-based layout in 3D, dynamic lighting, fog of war.

tasks.title: Character Models & Animation
tasks.description: Player agent 3D model, enemy models, walk/attack/death animations, particle effects.

tasks.title: Advanced Shaders & Materials
tasks.description: Custom shaders for rarity glow, normal mapping, PBR materials, status effect visualization.

tasks.title: Post-Processing & Effects
tasks.description: Bloom, depth of field, motion blur, film grain, chromatic aberration for hit feedback.

tasks.title: Lighting System
tasks.description: Dynamic lighting, shadow casting, light attenuation, baked lightmaps, room-specific colors.

tasks.title: Camera & View System
tasks.description: Smooth camera following, zoom controls, orthographic isometric view, camera shake, mini-map.

tasks.title: Loot Archetype System
tasks.description: Base item archetypes (swords, armor, rings), type classification, stat templates, base ranges.

tasks.title: Rarity & Tiering System
tasks.description: 8+ rarity tiers (Commonâ†’Mythic), stat rolls per rarity, affix pools, color coding, loot tables.

tasks.title: Procedural Affix Generation
tasks.description: 30+ prefixes, 40+ suffixes, affix interaction rules, weighted selection by rarity, value scaling.

tasks.title: Unique Item Database
tasks.description: 50+ unique items, set items (3-5 sets), legendary affixes, drop rate mechanics.

tasks.title: Loot Generation Engine
tasks.description: Seeded RNG, enemy defeat loot, chest generation, level scaling, rarity distribution curves.

tasks.title: Item Display & Comparison
tasks.description: Detailed tooltips, stat comparison on hover, rarity-based visuals, icon system.

tasks.title: Crafting System Architecture
tasks.description: Recipe database, item combination, enhancement mechanics, material tracking, result calculation.

tasks.title: Inventory Management
tasks.description: Grid-based inventory UI (Diablo-style), sorting/filtering, quick equip, stashing, encumbrance.

tasks.title: Skill Tree Architecture
tasks.description: 3+ skill trees, skill node types, point allocation, respec mechanics, unlock conditions.

tasks.title: Passive Skill System
tasks.description: Passive stat bonuses, multiplicative/additive scaling, interaction rules, calculation engine.

tasks.title: Active Ability System
tasks.description: Ability templates (damage/heal/utility), cooldown/mana, stat scaling, upgrade paths, combos.

tasks.title: Build Synergy Engine
tasks.description: Calculate multipliers & bonuses, synergy detection, build recommendations, stat conversion.

tasks.title: Experience & Leveling
tasks.description: XP gain formulas, level-up curves, attribute allocation, skill point rewards, level gating.

tasks.title: Dungeon-to-Crafting Loop
tasks.description: Better loot on deeper floors, recipe unlocks, gear requirements, upgrade chains (loop gameplay).

tasks.title: Ascension/Prestige System
tasks.description: New Game+ mode with scaling, prestige points, permanent unlocks, season leaderboards.

tasks.title: Action Combat System
tasks.description: Real-time movement, attack animations with hit feedback, knockback, invulnerability frames, attack speed.

tasks.title: Enemy AI Overhaul
tasks.description: Behavior tree system, difficulty-scaled AI, boss patterns, group tactics, weakness systems.

tasks.title: Damage & Hit Calculation
tasks.description: Critical strike system, dodge/evasion, armor/mitigation, elemental damage, type interactions.

tasks.title: Status Effects Expansion
tasks.description: 20+ effect types, visual indicators, duration/potency scaling, immunity, stacking rules.

tasks.title: Ability Effects & Visuals
tasks.description: Particle effects per ability, sound design, screen shake, health animations, damage numbers.

tasks.title: HUD & Real-time Feedback
tasks.description: Health/mana bars, ability cooldowns, status icons, combat log, DPS/healing meters.

tasks.title: Sound & Music System
tasks.description: Background music, combat encounter music, ability/enemy sounds, UI feedback sounds.

tasks.title: Advanced Dungeon Generation
tasks.description: Biome-based themes, room features (traps, hazards, chests), boss encounters, secret rooms.

tasks.title: Dynamic Enemy Scaling
tasks.description: Per-floor difficulty curves, player stat-aware scaling, rare enemies, champions, balance verification.

tasks.title: Seeded Run System
tasks.description: Run seed generation, leaderboard submission, community seed sharing, speedrun tracking.

tasks.title: Procedural Depth
tasks.description: 10,000+ unique item permutations, enemy variety, room layouts, random events.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Three.js optimization, mesh batching, LOD systems, asset streaming, memory cleanup.

tasks.title: Game Balance (Opus)
tasks.description: Balance loot drops, enemy difficulty, skill/abilities, progression curve, win rate analysis.

tasks.title: Bug Fixes & Polish
tasks.description: Critical bug fixes, edge cases, input responsiveness, network stability, UI refinement.

tasks.title: Accessibility & Localization
tasks.description: Color blind modes, difficulty presets, key remapping, subtitles, localization prep.

achievements: Integrated tasks into Command Center dashboard
Applied Web Dev Master + Game Dev Master patterns

notes: 3D Roguelike Transformation: 41 strategic tasks, 12-week timeline, $5.80 estimated cost. Inspired by Hades (combat), Diablo (loot), Path of Exile (progression), Borderlands (rarity tiers).
